abstract: Andrew Auernheimer, hacker known as Weev, claims responsibility for causing anti-Semitic fliers to appear on printers at dozen college campuses across country; says his actions were motivated by free speech concerns.
lead_paragraph: A computer hacker who goes by the name of “Weev” said he sent the fliers last week to all publicly accessible printers in North America, but it is not clear whether he could face charges.

headline.main: Hacker Says He Printed Anti-Semitic and Racist Fliers at Colleges Across U.S.
headline.print_headline: Hacker Says He Printed Racist Fliers at Colleges Across Country

snippet: A computer hacker who goes by the name of “Weev” said he sent the fliers last week to all publicly accessible printers in North America, but it is not clear whether he could face charges.
